name: 1 Bit Fantasy Shop
description:
1 Bit Fantasy Shop

As a new merchant you will sell your goods to to your customers. Try to comb through alot of your goods to sell the correct ones to the customers. Be extra careful not to be too chaotic.

Instructions:

  • Drag and Drop items to the customers walking through
  • Game Over when you sell 3 wrong items
  • Serve a number of customers to progress through next levels
  • Get as much high score as possible
  • Have fun!
